description:
The art of illustration for children has a long and rich tradition and is loved by countless readers. In this course you'll discover how to illustrate children's books.

Whether you're a newbie, an aspiring illustrator or you want to create beautiful drawings for your own children's book, this course is designed for you!

SO, Why don't you Get some sketchbooks, pens and something to colour with and lets get started!

In this course you will learn :

  • The importance of observing children and animals as your subjects,
  • The importance of your sketchbooks.
  • The important points for creating characters
  • The different media, material and techniques and how to use them
  • The questions to ask before starting a commission
  • And the importance of copyright and the marketing of your work


You have finally received your first commission , what now

  • Publishers use terms such as flush right and left, refer to a certain paper size and colouring techniques
  • In this course there is a guide included, that you can download, to help you through the illustration slang, phrases and requirements
title: Illustrating children's books
